description: You will most likely only encounter the files if you are in the radio broadcasting industry and use Digilink software, such as Digilink 2 or 3. However, DIG data files are obscure nowadays, since the versions that supported the files have been superseded by other versions of Digilink software.

common_filenames.description: DLAUDIT.DIG - Contains log activity, including error messages, which is helpful for diagnosing bugs in the event of a system crash.
CLOCKS.DIG - Contains system passwords for Digilink, the jock list, and clock configuration details.
